String.string: Speak with Tamur. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#1088$$Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Our guests are in the Plaza of Triumph. [Speak with {@creature:528#5008$$Kamat} to go outside Headquarters.]
Deliver the Processed Aeonalis Pylons to Paesyn.
Ask Paesyn how you can go to Velika.
You arrived at the secret rendezvous. What could be going on?
Talk to Paesyn and go to rendezvous. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#10038$$Paesyn} to teleport to Valkyon Federation Commander Residence.]
"Are you sure? Tell me what happened."
Speak with Seir. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#10038$$Paesyn} to teleport to Valkyon Federation Commander Residence.]
Speak with Seir again. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#10038$$Paesyn} to teleport to Valkyon Federation Commander Residence.]
Ask Kamia what happened. [Talk to {@linkcreature:84#10038$$Paesyn} to teleport to the Federation Commanderâ€™s Residence.]
Calm down Grapine and try to speak with him.
The deva empire...will win back glory...with Lakan's...no, NO!
Grapine came back to his senses. Ask what happened. [You can advance this quest only when you use the sedative to {@linkcreature:503#2006#Grapine}.]
Defeat Grapine and the demokrons from the rift. Collect the Archdevan Mark.
Show the archdevan mark to Seir.
Defeat the demokrons from the rift and collect the Archdevan Mark.
Show the Archdevan Mark to Seir.
